data.actual_result: A black image appears and the webcam does not turn on
data.expected_result: A Preview of your webcam will appear
data.short_description: Video Preview/Test shows black screen and doesn't turn on Webcam
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings - Go to Voice & Video - In Video Settings, choose a working Webcam, then click "Test Video" in the Preview area
